author: jethroo
title: Dragon is the key
review:
I got this set on ebay for my son, who is 1 1/2 by now. Actually he only got the dragon to play with, because the knight with the smaller parts is better kept away from him for now cause he still puts everything in his mouth. The dragon is great with its moveable parts and stuff, so great that my 3y old daughter always attempt to steal it from him while he is playing.

Pros

  • dragon i really big and palmfull
  • wings are kind of flexible (kind of ball joint)  and can be arranged in various positions
  • appropriate for early ages (the dragon) 

Cons

  • only upper mouth part is moveable, lower mouth part and tail would have been nice too
  • i got this set sealed, but color was already worn of the dragons teeth
  • as you look in the dragons mouth, there is a slot to put something in there, a Flame would be nice there too   

Overall it' s a great great set bringing in lot's of play for the price. I love it!
